refnamediv.refpurpose: client interface to remote BonoboApplication objects

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: BonoboAppClientMsgDesc
bonobo_app_client_new ()
refsect2.para: app_server: object reference to a Bonobo::Application; this function takes ownership of this reference (use bonobo_object_dup_ref() if you want to keep your own reference.)
Create an application client object connected to the remote (or local) Bonobo::Application object.

para.warning: Applications should not use this function. See bonobo_application_register_unique().

refsect2.title: bonobo_app_client_new_instance ()
refsect2.programlisting: gint bonobo_app_client_new_instance (BonoboAppClient *app_client, int argc, char *argv[], CORBA_Environment *opt_env);
refsect2.para: Ask the application server to emit a "new-instance" signal containing the specified string vector.

refsect2.title: bonobo_app_client_msg_send_valist ()
refsect2.programlisting: GValue* bonobo_app_client_msg_send_valist (BonoboAppClient *app_client, const char *message, CORBA_Environment *opt_env, GType first_arg_type, va_list var_args);

refsect2.title: bonobo_app_client_msg_send_argv ()
refsect2.programlisting: GValue * bonobo_app_client_msg_send_argv (BonoboAppClient *app_client, const char *message, const GValue *argv[], CORBA_Environment *opt_env);
refsect2.para: Like bonobo_app_client_msg_send(), except that it receives a single argument vector instead of a variable number of arguments.

listitem.simpara: NULL-terminated vector of pointers to GValue, the arguments to pass with the message.

refsect2.title: bonobo_app_client_msg_send ()
refsect2.programlisting: GValue* bonobo_app_client_msg_send (BonoboAppClient *app_client, const char *message, CORBA_Environment *opt_env, GType first_arg_type, ...);
refsect2.para:
Send a message to the application server. Takes a variable length argument list of GType, value pairs, terminated with G_TYPE_NONE. Values are direct C values, not GValues! Example:
GValue *retval; retval = bonobo_app_client_msg_send (app_client, "openURL", G_TYPE_STRING, "http://www.gnome.org", G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, TRUE, G_TYPE_NONE);

listitem.simpara: the client interface associated with the application to which we wish to send a message
a GValue containing the value returned from the aplication server.
